title: The Valley of the Moons - Gold Vermeil and Pearl Cuff
body_html:
Inspired by the 1968 Louise Bourgeois sculpture of the same name, this
delicate cuff moves, collapses and rises, mimicking the characteristics
natural landscapes. Wear with ‘Deflated (Do Not Inflate)’ for a subdued
sculptural look.

****

****

****

  

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil. The height of the piece is 52mm, its width is 67mm and
its depth is 4mm.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

* It is certified in accordance with the Hallmarking Act 1973

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

The title taken from the 1967-68 Louise Bourgeois sculpture of the same name,
this delicate cuff is crafted from 14ct gold vermeil with moves, collapses and
rises to mimic the characteristics natural landscapes. Wear with ‘Deflated (Do
Not Inflate)’ for a delicate sculptural look.

title: B43 - Cushion - Matte Pink
L04 - Candlestick Holder - Brushed Brass
B34 - Set of 2 Candlesticks - Matte White
B26 - Large Vase
body_html:
Completedworks x Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki

Goliath's sculptural form reflects a conceptual, theme-based approach, which
stands in stark contrast to the classical rules of decoration that pervade
traditional ceramics. The flowing contours of the piece reference the way
drapery has been used by painters to convey movement since the Renaissance.

**In stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

  

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted. It has a height of 18.5cm, a width of
18cm and a depth of 17cm at it's highest, widest and deepest points. Goliath
has a matte surface that is rough to touch and that lends it an imposing
quality. It can stand on its own as a sculptural object without any floral
arrangement.  

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here
saf_body:
Completedworks x Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki

The flowing contours of the piece reference the way drapery has been used by painters to convey movement since the Renaissance.

In stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch


Details

title: L09 - Small Vessel - Brushed Brass
B42 - Cushion - Matte White
B33 - Tall Vase - Matte White
B31 - Small Vase - Matte White w/ Faux Pearls
body_html:
Part of an ongoing study into the deceptive potential of materials, tough
ceramic forms appear malleable and imitate a softer, more supple materials as
the folds, pinches and creases of each piece explore the limit of their
expressive potential.
saf_body: Part of an ongoing study into the deceptive potential of materials, tough ceramic forms appear malleable and imitate a softer, more supple materials as the folds, pinches and creases of each piece explore the limit of their expressive potential.

Classicworks™ Heart - Platinum Plated Sterling Silver Necklace
body_html:
At Completedworks we believe in the beauty and complexity of the everyday.
Inspired by evocative memories of childhood birthday parties, this gold
vermeil heart pendant mimics the contours and folds of a helium balloon.
Secured by a gold vermeil chain with a clip fastening.

**Custom-made: despatched in two-three weeks**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil. The height of the piece is 18mm, its width is 19mm and
its depth is 3mm.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

body_html:
A signature piece of the Tied Collection, Flow was inspired by the concentric
circles of Amsterdam’s canals, as referenced in Albert Camus “The Fall”. In
this ‘Flow’ earring a strand of sterling silver moves in a dynamic spiral
across the ear. This ‘Flow’ earring is thoughtfully crafted in sterling silver
and secured with an earring post and butterfly back.

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and is available with
platinum or 14ct yellow gold plating.

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

title: Gift Card
body_html:
Spoil the one you love with a Completedworks gift card. Choose the value of
your gift card and we’ll send it to your recipient with a personalised message
from you.

The Completedworks gift card is valid for one year from purchase and can be
applied to any completedworks.com order excluding promotions.

Contact info@completedworks.com for assistance.

title: Befuddled - Gold Vermeil Necklace
body_html:
Eight pairs of subtley changing looped forms in gold vermeil are interlocked
to construct this unconventional chain necklace designed to sit above the
neckline. Inspired by wabi-sabi - a world view centered on the acceptance of
transience and imperfection.

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in 14ct yellow gold plated metal.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

  

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

title: The Best Place to be a Puffin - Platinum Plated Ring
body_html:
This is a ring replete with all the right details – ample volume on top,
perfected shanks, lightly contoured form. It carries the silhouette, albeit
somewhat distorted, of that classic signet your great-uncle* wore without the
weight of history and class politics. You can engrave it with a shield if you
want – but we won’t help you with that. An alternative to streetwear’s
reinvention of the signet.

(*We would not presume to have a guess at his name here.)

****

**Custom made - Despatch in 2-3 weeks**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil and comes in sizes

Extra Small is US 5.5 / UK L

Small is US 7 / UK O

Medium is US 8.5 / UK Q+1/2

Large is US 9.5 / UK S+1/2

Extra Large is US 10.5 / UK U+1/2

The width of the piece is 17mm and its depth is 1mm.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

* It is certified in accordance with the Hallmarking Act 1973

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here
saf_body:
This is a ring replete with all the right details – ample volume on top, perfected shanks, lightly contoured form. It carries the silhouette, albeit somewhat distorted, of that classic signet your great-uncle* wore without the weight of history and class politics. You can engrave it with a shield if you want – but we won’t help you with that. An alternative to streetwear’s reinvention of the signet.

(*We would not presume to have a guess at his name here.)

 

Custom made - Despatch in 2-3 weeks

 

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct yellow gold vermeil and comes in sizes

Extra Small is US 5.5 / UK L

Small is US 7 / UK O

Medium is US 8.5 / UK Q+1/2

Large is US 9.5 / UK S+1/2

Extra Large is US 10.5 / UK U+1/2

 

The width of the piece is 17mm and its depth is 1mm. 

  

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

* It is certified in accordance with the Hallmarking Act 1973

 

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is subject to a single fee of £20 per order.  

For more information on shipping click here

title: Solitude / Vessel in Blush
body_html:
**Completedworks x Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki**

**Deceptively simple, yet soulful, this vase is designed for unexpected and
irreverent floral arrangements.**

Its sculptural form reflects the maker’s, Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki,
conceptual, theme-based approach, which stands in stark contrast to the
classical rules of decoration that pervade traditional ceramics. The flowing
contours of the piece reference the way drapery has been used by painters to
convey movement since the Renaissance.

**About the Collection**

Fold was developed in collaboration with mixed media artist Ekaterina
Bazhenova Yamasaki, as a continuation of an ongoing study into the way
materials can deceive. Presented as a collection of fine jewellery and vases,
each piece exhibits its own expressive potential through the folds and creases
that make up its form. Materials deceive, with the hard metal and porcelain
forms appearing to imitate the visual properties of another more supple
material such as foam.

**Custom made - Despatch in 4-6 weeks**

Details

Handcrafted ceramic.

7.5cm x 6cm x 14cm

Good to know

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here
saf_body:
Completedworks x Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki

Deceptively simple, yet soulful, this vase is designed for unexpected and irreverent floral arrangements.

Its sculptural form reflects the maker’s, Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki, conceptual, theme-based approach, which stands in stark contrast to the classical rules of decoration that pervade traditional ceramics. The flowing contours of the piece reference the way drapery has been used by painters to convey movement since the Renaissance.

About the Collection

Fold was developed in collaboration with mixed media artist Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki, as a continuation of an ongoing study into the way materials can deceive. Presented as a collection of fine jewellery and vases, each piece exhibits its own expressive potential through the folds and creases that make up its form. Materials deceive, with the hard metal and porcelain forms appearing to imitate the visual properties of another more supple material such as foam.

Custom made - Despatch in 4-6 weeks

Details

Handcrafted ceramic.

7.5cm x 6cm x 14cm

Good to know

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is subject to a single fee of £20 per order.  

For more information on shipping click here

title: Crumple - Recycled Sterling Silver, Pearl and Ceramic Earrings
body_html:
In this asymmetric pair a crumpled gold vermeil dangle earring sits alongside
a pearl drop earring carefully crafted from ceramic beads, freshwater and
baroque pearls. Secured with an earring post and butterfly back, these
mismatched earrings add the perfect sculptural flourish to finish your outfit.  

  

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

  

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil, with freshwater and baroque pearls. The ceramic beads are
handmade in the UK. The height of the piece is 73mm, its width is 20mm and its
depth is 7mm.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

* It is certified in accordance with the Hallmarking Act 1973

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

######

title: Unfolded - Recycled Sterling Silver Earrings
body_html:
Filled with an uncomplicated grace and a gentle ease, these are the earrings
that transcend the week – going with you to work, beautifully clinging through
an impromptu mid-week mishap and even making it to that dressed-down Saturday
jaunt. From where do they get all this bombast and elegance? Well, from the
rippling, tumbling, ruffling effects of the winds across Yorkshire’s moors
which inspired them, of course. If the vermeil fades or you lose the butterfly
clips just let us know and we will sort you out – we already know you are
going to be wearing them a lot.  

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil. The height of the piece is 32mm, its width is 9mm and its
depth is 6mm.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

title: Cohesion - Recycled Sterling Silver Earrings
body_html:
Classical femininity meets the purposefully chaotic. These mismatched earrings
are inspired by the fold’s in a child’s paper fortune teller. Chic and
characterful – a pearl hangs from one side, nothing from the other.

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil. The height of the left earring is 40mm, its width is 28mm
and its depth is 0.6mm. The height of the right earring is 29mm, its width is
24mm and its depth is 0.6mm. The piece is finished with a freshwater pearl
measuring 12mm by 10mm.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

title: Present Absence - Gold Vermeil Ear Climber
body_html:
A deceptive gold vermeil structure set with white topaz gemstones. Giving the
illusion of a double piercing the ear climber appears to move through the ear
and extend out behind. Consisting of two sections, the top piece sits on the
front of the ear lobe and curves to sit inside the ear, while the back piece
contains a silicone stopper to fasten the piece securely so no earring post is
required.

****

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in recycled silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil.

body_html:
A single, continuous line of sterling silver dynamically curves and threads
through itself to form these mismatched earrings. The generous loops of the

title: Fruit Bowl
body_html:
**Completedworks x Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki**

**Deceptively simple, yet soulful, this fruit bowl is designed for unexpected
and irreverent fruit arrangements.**

Its sculptural form reflects the artist's, Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki,
conceptual, theme-based approach, which stands in stark contrast to the
classical rules of decoration that pervade traditional ceramics. The flowing
contours of the piece reference the way drapery has been used by painters to
convey movement since the Renaissance.

**About the Collection**

Fold was developed in collaboration with mixed media artist Ekaterina
Bazhenova Yamasaki, as a continuation of an ongoing study into the way
materials can deceive. Presented as a collection of fine jewellery and vases,
each piece exhibits its own expressive potential through the folds and creases
that make up its form. Materials deceive, with the hard metal and porcelain
forms appearing to imitate the visual properties of another more supple
material such as foam.

**In stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

Details

Handcrafted ceramic.

20cm x 12cm

Good to know

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

title: How to Appear Invisible - Small Pitcher
body_html:
**Completedworks x Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki**

**Deceptively simple, yet soulful, this vase is designed for unexpected and
irreverent floral arrangements.**

Its sculptural form reflects the maker’s, Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki,
conceptual, theme-based approach, which stands in stark contrast to the
classical rules of decoration that pervade traditional ceramics. The flowing
contours of the piece reference the way drapery has been used by painters to
convey movement since the Renaissance.

**About the Collection**

Fold was developed in collaboration with mixed media artist Ekaterina
Bazhenova Yamasaki, as a continuation of an ongoing study into the way
materials can deceive. Presented as a collection of fine jewellery and vases,
each piece exhibits its own expressive potential through the folds and creases
that make up its form. Materials deceive, with the hard metal and porcelain
forms appearing to imitate the visual properties of another more supple
material such as foam.

**In stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

Details

Handcrafted ceramic.

13cm x 12cm

Good to know

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

**Completedworks x Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki**

**Deceptively simple, yet soulful, this vase is designed for unexpected and
irreverent floral arrangements.**

Its sculptural form reflects the maker’s, Ekaterina Bazhenova Yamasaki,
conceptual, theme-based approach, which stands in stark contrast to the
classical rules of decoration that pervade traditional ceramics. The flowing
contours of the piece reference the way drapery has been used by painters to
convey movement since the Renaissance.

**About the Collection**

Fold was developed in collaboration with mixed media artist Ekaterina
Bazhenova Yamasaki, as a continuation of an ongoing study into the way
materials can deceive. Presented as a collection of fine jewellery and vases,
each piece exhibits its own expressive potential through the folds and creases
that make up its form. Materials deceive, with the hard metal and porcelain
forms appearing to imitate the visual properties of another more supple
material such as foam.

**Custom made - Despatch in 2-3 weeks**

Details

Handcrafted ceramic.

7.5cm x 6cm x 14cm

Good to know

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

title: Deflated ("Do Not inflate") - Ring
body_html:
**The curves and folds of this ring explore notions of expansion and
retraction. Glimpses of a flatter surface are seen between two sculptural
cylinder shapes, creating the illusion of a larger, collaps** ed structure.

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil. The width of the piece is 6mm and its depth is 1mm.

Extra Small is US 5.5 / UK L

Small is US 7 / UK O

Medium is US 8.5 / UK Q+1/2

Large is US 9.5 / UK S+1/2

Extra Large is US 10.5 / UK U+1/2

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

circles of Amsterdam’s canals, as referenced in Albert Camus “The Fall”. This
single ‘Flow’ earring moves in a dynamic spiral across the ear. Finished with
a decorative freshwater pearl, the piece is secured with an earring post and
butterfly back.

platinum or 14ct yellow gold plating. Made with freshwater pearls.

title: Blast - Ear Cuff
body_html:
A bold continuous line moves and intersects itself to form this ear cuff,
exploring the gulf between uninterrupted movement and a single, explosive rush
of energy.

**Custom made: despatched in 2-3 weeks**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in recycled sterling silver and is
available with either platinum, black ruthenium or 14ct yellow gold plating.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

title: Flawed Logic - Single Earring
body_html:
In this single earring a twisted gold vermeil hoop and finished with
handcrafted ceramic beads, balancing elegant design with bolder, modern
shapes. Secured with a clip fastening.

**Custom-Made: despatched in 2-3 weeks**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted using sterling silver with platinum
plating. Our ceramic pieces are handmade in the UK. These hoop earrings have a
diameter of 23mm and a depth of 3mm. The approximate diameter of the ceramic
beads is 28mm.

  

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

body_html:
A bold design with a masculine edge, this gold vermeil ear climber is designed
to sit in the ear and wrap around the ear lobe. Fastened with a sterling
silver earring post and butterfly back.

  

**In stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

  

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil. The height of the piece is 24mm and its width is 6mm.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

title: Surrounded Islands - 18ct Yellow Gold and Diamond Ring
body_html:
A white gold band, delicately edged with diamonds, softly meanders around the
finger, swelling and twisting with exquisitely gentle motion. ****

  

  

 **Custom-made: despatched in four-six weeks**  

Details

Handcrafted from 18ct yellow gold and 0.47ct diamonds.

  

Good to know

* Made in 18ct yellow gold

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

* It is certified in accordance with the Hallmarking Act 1973

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

title: Flow - Sterling Silver and Pearl Earrings
body_html:
A signature piece of the Tied Collection, Flow was inspired by the concentric
circles of Amsterdam’s canals, as referenced in Albert Camus “The Fall”. In
these ‘Flow’ earrings a strand of gold vermeil moves in a dynamic spiral
across the ear. Finished with decorative freshwater pearls, each earring is
secured with an earring post and butterfly back.

**Custom-made: despatch in 2-3 days**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

and left-of-centre with silhouettes of pure elegance. Somewhere way back in

carefully positioned to invoke notions of the instability, and the
unknowability, of our place in the world. Looks equally good pinned high or
low over a messy pony tail

Custom-made: despatched in four-six weeks

 

Details

Handcrafted from 18ct yellow gold and 0.27ct diamonds.     

 


Good to know

* Made in 18ct yellow gold

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

* It is certified in accordance with the Hallmarking Act 1973

 

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is subject to a single fee of £20 per order.  

For more information on shipping click here

title: Dossing Around - Gold Vermeil Pendant
body_html:
Strands of gold vermeil vivaciously knot around each other in this pendant
necklace. Secured with a clip fastening.

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil. The height of the piece is 12mm and its width is 12mm.
The length of the chain is 20 inches.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

Shipping

Delivery is free within UK, EU and USA. Delivery to all other destinations is
subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

For more information on shipping click here

title: Dossing About - Gold Vermeil Pendant
body_html:
﻿Strands of gold vermeil energetically knot around each other to form a
spherical pendant necklace. Secured with a clip fastening.

****

**In Stock: Order before 12pm GMT for same weekday despatch**

  

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct
yellow gold vermeil. The height of the piece is 9mm and its width is 10mm. The
length of the chain is 16 inches.

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

title: Hollowed Out Tank - Yellow Gold and Diamond Ring
body_html:
A miniature sculpture of a tank, carved from 18ct yellow gold and studded with
diamonds, is crushed by a South Sea pearl. Imaginative and incisive, the ring
is politically conscious and intricately crafted using only the highest
quality of materials.

It is handcrafted from 18ct yellow gold, 0.243ct diamonds and a carefully
selected high-grade South Sea Pearl.

Collection: Tank

body_html:
The yellow gold band lyrically coils around the finger, curving beyond the

and graceful architectural act.

**Custom-made: despatched in four-six weeks**

It is handcrafted from 18ct yellow gold and diamond.

  

Good to know

* Made in 18ct yellow gold

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

* It is certified in accordance with the Hallmarking Act 1973

subject to a single fee of £20 per order.

title: Unfolded - Gold Vermeil and Pearl Earrings
body_html:
Filled with an uncomplicated grace and a gentle ease, these are the earrings
that transcend the week – going with you to work, beautifully clinging through
an impromptu mid-week mishap and even making it to that dressed-down Saturday
jaunt. From where do they get all this bombast and elegance? Well, from the
rippling, tumbling, ruffling effects of the winds across Yorkshire’s moors
which inspired them, of course. If the vermeil fades or you lose the butterfly
clips just let us know and we will sort you out – we already know you are
going to be wearing them a lot.

saf_body:
Filled with an uncomplicated grace and a gentle ease, these are the earrings that transcend the week – going with you to work, beautifully clinging through an impromptu mid-week mishap and even making it to that dressed-down Saturday jaunt. From where do they get all this bombast and elegance? Well, from the rippling, tumbling, ruffling effects of the winds across Yorkshire’s moors which inspired them, of course. If the vermeil fades or you lose the butterfly clips just let us know and we will sort you out – we already know you are going to be wearing them a lot.

Custom made - Despatch in 2-3 weeks

Details

The piece is thoughtfully handcrafted in sterling silver and plated in 14ct yellow gold vermeil. Finished with sustainably sourced freshwater pearls. The height of the piece (without pearl) is 32mm its width is 9mm and its depth is 6mm.

  

Good to know

* Made in solid sterling silver

* Ethically sourced materials

* One year guarantee

 

Shipping
